Title: All of the Arrows
Description:
As soon as their reinforcements arrive, the yaungol are going to overrun our position here. If they do that, the village will be lost.

Would you be willing to retrieve as many arrows off the battlefield as you can carry? I have a plan that just might save us with your help.
CompletionText: How many arrows do you have?
RewardText:
Thank you, $n. You've saved our defensive line here.

This next attack wouldn't have been possible without you.
